cast.overview: Still scarred by the trauma he endured as a child at the Overlook Hotel, Dan Torrance faces the ghosts of the past when he meets Abra, a courageous teen who desperately needs his help -- and who possesses a powerful extrasensory ability called the "shine".
cast.title: Doctor Sleep

details.biography: Kyliegh Curran (born December 10, 2005) is an American actress. She is most well-known for her roles as Abra Stone in the supernatural horror film Doctor Sleep (2019) and as Lenore Usher in the gothic horror miniseries The Fall of the House of Usher (2023), winning a Saturn Award for Best Performance by a Younger Actor for the former.
details.name: Kyliegh Curran
